resources.string: Video Live Wallpaper is a free application that takes up very little memory and storage. There may be some bugs, but developers will find time to fix it ^_^

Add boot auto-start(2018-07-19) 
Optimize package size(2018-07-19) 
Fix onDestroy case fc bug(2018-07-20) 
Set the default volume to mute(2019-02-11) 
Solve the first wallpaper setting error problem(2019-02-11) 
Add a setting entry in the livewallpaper preview interface(2019-02-11) 
Remove lanucher icon(2019-02-11) 
Redesign the interface(2019-03-02) 
Add the choice of file settings method(2019-03-02) 
Recovery lanucher icon(2019-03-03)
